db:abstract.db:para: Provides C++ classes for rendering web content in a QWidget based application.

db:article.db:para: Provides C++ classes for rendering web content in a QWidget based application.

db:listitem.db:para: The QWebEngineView class provides a widget that is used to view and edit web documents.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt WebEngine Widgets module provides a web browser engine as well as C++ classes to render and interact with web content.
To link against the module using build with qmake, add the following QT variable to your qmake .pro file:
For build with CMake use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package and target_link_libraries() to link against the module:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS WebEngineWidgets) target_link_libraries(target PRIVATE Qt6::WebEngineWidgets)
db:section.db:para: The minimum amount of code needed to load and display an HTML page requires just implementing the QWebEngineView class.
